marklogic.body: Using Infrared cameras , it was found out that compared to its predecessor, the new temperature is 5degree Celcius. So what? It is nowhere stated that users Burnt their hands or any other body part. Temperature of Apple rivals are also not mentioned. So, let the users say. Apple does not produce anything without proper checks. ten degree or twenty degree more or less doesn't matter as long as the outer cabinets gives you Burns. Ipad is from Apple and they are trend setters and creators of history. Other cheap brands just run behind them like hounds. that s all
